action_items.task: Place laptop orders for new engineers.
Set up all new hire accounts with IT.
Send personal details and required system access for new hires to IT.
Reach out to Mike and Jennifer to confirm availability for mentorship.
Look into restaurant options for the team lunch.
Send around restaurant choices for the team lunch.

decisions.context: To ensure new hires have their equipment in time for their start date.
decisions.decision: James will handle laptop orders and configurations.

decisions.context: To ensure new hires have necessary system access.
decisions.decision: Sarah will work with IT to set up all new hire accounts.

decisions.context: To provide guidance and support to new employees.
decisions.decision: Mentors will be assigned to each new hire.
A team lunch will be scheduled for the new hires' first Friday.

key_points: New hires start on November 11th (one on Monday, two on Wednesday).
Need for timely equipment procurement and configuration.
Requirement for setting up accounts and system access.
summary.tldr: The team discussed the onboarding plan for three new engineers starting on November 11th. Key tasks include equipment ordering, account setup, mentor assignment, and a welcome lunch.
